about_the_game:
*knock Knock*
A knock at the door? Who could it be?
You go open the door. Nobody's there.
At least that's what it seems like, until a tiny voice pulls your gaze to the floor.
You see a tiny elephant, no bigger than a softball, wave at you...





Elfie is a game about a small round elephant named Elfie.
Grow your friendship with your cute little new friend (and roommate).
Learn about all her hobbies, her favorite things and enjoy her company.
A casual and laid back experience that you can play at your own pace!

Elfie blends elements from the virtual pet, minigame compilation and visual novel genres.


  • Virtual Friend (Pet): Make sure she's eating a balanced diet (not just peanut butter), cleaning up after herself and, most importantly, getting enough sleep and attention.
  • Minigames: Inspired by the nostalgia of multicart cartridges, the collection of minigames represents things that Elfie enjoys doing and her various hobbies.
  • Non-Linear Narrative: Your interactions with her will shape your friendship. And not only through dialogue. For example: Do you visit her everyday? Do you always play the same minigames? Do you take a lot of time answering her questions? Different players may come out with different experiences.
  • Wholesome and casual: The game is meant to be a relaxing, positive and thoughtful experience. Play it and experience it as you please!
  • Elfie: So cute! That's a feature in itself!

Credits:

PV2 Music: "Bitsy" by silent swimmer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 GB VRAM, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some minigames have feature alternate game modes that use the microphone.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen, 2.0 GHz

short_description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to have an elephant the size of a softball as a friend? Elfie is a hybrid genre game that answers just that! Enjoy the company of your new rotund friend and partake in her hobbies represented by a collection of minigames.
